member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.AccountUnityClient
member.summary: Unity client for functionality related to signing in, registering and signing out.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.AccountUnityClient.HasInterface
member.summary: Has an interface been provided for this Unity Client?

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.AccountUnityClient.IsActive
member.summary: Is there an interface and if so is it currently active?

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.AccountUnityClient.DisplayLogInPanel(System.Action{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Displays interface if provided and allowAutoLogin is false. Attempts automatic sign in using provided details if allowAutoLogin is true. Note: allowAutoLogin is made false after automatic sign in is first attempted.
member.param: Callback which will result whether the user successfully signed in.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.AccountUnityClient.Hide
member.summary: Hide the UI object if it is currently active.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.AccountUnityClient.Logout(System.Action{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Sign out the currently signed in user
member.param: Callback which will result whether the user successfully signed out.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseAccountInterface
member.summary: Base abstract class for controlling the UI object related to user accounts.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseAccountInterface._name
member.summary: Input field used for providing usernames. Required.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseAccountInterface._password
member.summary: Input field used for providing passwords. Required.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseAccountInterface._loginButton
member.summary: Button used to trigger attempting to sign in. Can be left null.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseAccountInterface._registerButton
member.summary: Button used to trigger attempting to register a new account. Can be left null.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseAccountInterface._rememberMeToggle
member.summary: Toggle used to enable/disable remembering the next signed in user's details for future sessions. Can be left null.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseAccountInterface._closeButton
member.summary: Button used to disable this object. Can be left null.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseAccountInterface._errorText
member.summary: Text object which displays errors if/when they occur. Can be left null.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseAccountInterface.Awake
member.summary: Base Awake method adds onClick listeners for the login, register and close buttons.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.ActorResponseAllowableActions
member.summary: ActorResponse with additional information on if the current user can add and remove them.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.ActorResponseAllowableActions.Actor
member.summary: ActorResponse contains the actor ID and Name.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.ActorResponseAllowableActions.CanAdd
member.summary: Can the currently signed in user add or accept a request from this actor?

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.ActorResponseAllowableActions.CanRemove
member.summary: Can the currently signed in user remove or reject a request from this actor?

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseInterface
member.summary: Base abstract class for controlling UI objects

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseInterface._errorText
member.summary: Text object which displays errors if/when they occur. Can be left null.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseInterface._closeButton
member.summary: Button used to disable this object. Can be left null.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseInterface._signinButton
member.summary: Button used to display account interface (if available) if no user is signed in. Can be left null.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseInterface.Awake
member.summary: Base Awake method adds onClick listeners for the close and signin buttons.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseInterface.PreDisplay
member.summary: Functionality triggered before displaying the UI object.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseInterface.Show(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Used to display/redraw the UI on this object. Triggers methods in this order: HideInterfaces - abstract method used to enable/disable UI on this object and hide other UI objects. PreDraw - private method. Activates object using SUGARManager.Unity.EnableObject, resets error text and hides signin button. Draw - abstract method where creation and placement of the UI should be performed. ErrorDraw - where error text is determined and set, if required.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseInterface.HideInterfaces
member.summary: Should be used to enable/disable UI on this object and hide other UI objects.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseInterface.Draw
member.summary: Should be used to set, create and place UI on this object.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseInterface.ErrorDraw(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Should be used to set error text and disable UI objects due to errors, if required. By default sets error text in case of no user being signed in or loading issues.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseInterface.LoadErrorText
member.summary: Get error string if there were issues loading what was required.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseInterface.NoResultsErrorText
member.summary: Get error string if there were no results to display.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.BaseInterface.OnSignIn
member.summary: Triggered by successful sign-in via this UI object.

member.summary: Get GameData for the currently signed in user for this game.

Optional parameter. If provided, only GameData with a matching key will be returned.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.ResourceUnityClient.Get(System.Action{System.Collections.Generic.List{PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.ResourceResponse}},System.String[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the resources with the keys provided for the signed in user. If globalResource is true, resources will be global rather than for the game.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.ResourceUnityClient.Transfer(System.Int32,System.String,System.Int64,System.Action{System.Boolean},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Transfer the resource with the key provided from the currently signed in user to the user with the provided id. If globalResource is true, resource transferred will be global rather than for the game.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.ResourceUnityClient.TryTake(System.Int32,System.String,System.Int64,System.Action{System.Boolean},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Attempt to Take a resource from an actor. If globalResource is true, resource transferred will be global rather than for the game.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.ResourceUnityClient.Add(System.String,System.Int64,System.Action{System.Boolean},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Add the resource with the key provided from the currently signed in user. If globalResource is true, resource transferred will be global rather than for the game.

member.summary: Class for managing Unity elements of the asset

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.SUGARUnityManager.AnyActiveUI
member.summary: Is any piece of SUGAR UI currently active?

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.SUGARUnityManager.SetBlocker(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set if the blocker should be used and if it should close objects when clicked

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.SUGARUnityManager.EnableObject(UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Enable a piece of SUGAR UI. This should be used instead of SetActive to ensure UI and blocker ordering is correct.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.SUGARUnityManager.DisableObject(UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Disable a piece of SUGAR UI. This should be used instead of SetActive to ensure UI and blocker ordering is correct.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.SUGARUnityManager.SetSpinner(System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the direction and speed of the loading spinner

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.SUGARUnityManager.StartSpinner(System.String)
member.summary: Start the loading spinner. This method should be used instead of directly calling Loading.Start to ensure UI and blocker ordering is correct.

member.name: M:PlayGen.SUGAR.Unity.SUGARUnityManager.StopSpinner(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Stop the loading spinner. This method should be used instead of directly calling Loading.Stop to ensure UI and blocker ordering is correct.
